org.wattdepot.server.httpapi

Class UserGroupServerResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.UniformResource
        • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
          • org.wattdepot.server.httpapi.WattDepotServerResource
            • org.wattdepot.server.httpapi.UserGroupServerResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserGroupResource

    public class UserGroupServerResource
extends WattDepotServerResource
implements UserGroupResource
    UserGroupServerResource - Handles the HTTP API ("/wattdepot/{group_id}/usergroup/", "/wattdepot/{group_id}/usergroup/{usergroup_id}").
    Author:
    Cam Moore
